redirect.title: Notice on resetting your password
redirect.disc: Reset your password to keep it secured. Set the password recovery question & answer to use them when you for get your password.

login.error: Unauthorized. Please check the ID and password and try again.

resetPass.title: Password reset
resetPass.disc: You may reset password using your account ID and password recovery question & answer.

change.notice: Login using a new password after resetting your password.
change.passRule: Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to be included with at least 4 of following character types. - Uppercase letter - Lowercase letter- Number - Special character ( .  ! @ # $ % ). Also your password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.

questionList: What is the name of your first pet?
What is the name of your best friend when you were a teenager?
What was the first dis you learned?
What was the first movie you watched at the cinema?
Where was your first flight to visit?
What is the title of your favorite fairy tale book?
In which city did your parents first meet?
What is the name of the beach you've been to for the first time?
What was the name of the first mountain you visited?
What is your favorite car model?

notSet.title: Password recovery question & answer not set
notSet.disc: The password recovery question & answer cannot be found. Please inquire Master admin to reset your password.

IdDiscord.title: Incorrect ID
IdDiscord.disc: ID cannot be found. Please inquire Master admin to create an account.

answerDiscord.title: Password recovery question & answer is incorrect
answerDiscord.disc: The password recovery question & answer you have entered is wrong please check them again.
